  1) Failure:
Test#test_xxx [-PWD-/test.rb:7]:
Failed assertion, no message given.

  2) Failure:
foo::bar#test_0001_baz [-PWD-/spec.rb:9]:
Failed assertion, no message given.

ruby test.rb -n 'Test#test_xxx' # test.rb:7
ruby spec.rb -n 'foo::bar#test_0001_baz' # spec.rb:9
